text: ane eka imanavala vyakti'e, je phira'aunana kutumba manthi hato ane potanum imana chupavi rahyo hato, kahyum ke sum tame eka vyaktine phakta atali vata mate katala karo cho ke te kahe che, ke maro palanahara allaha che ane tamara palanahara taraphathi purava la'ine avyo ane te jutho hoya, to tenum jutha tena mate ja che ane jo te saco hoya to je (yatana)num vacana tamari samaksa kari rahyo che, temanthi kamika to tamara para avi pahoncase, allaha ta'ala tene marga nathi batavato, je atireka karanara ane juththa che
